item.title: Putting your workout to move
item.description: In this quick post, we’ll take one MTB ride, tracked by FitBit in a TXC File, and generate a animated gif. Using gganimate Package and using the same code we learned, we can animate the map with few words. Reading TCX File We already saw to how read and GPS track information stored in a TXC/GPX file, once it’s just an XML File. library(XML) library(lubridate) library(tidyverse) library(ggplot2) library(ggmap) library(gganimate) library(knitr) file <- "11654237848.
